name: eVestment Alliance
overview: eVestment Alliance, LLC operates as a Web-based provider of investment information and analytic technology products and databases. The companyâ€™s products include Web-based Analytics, which provides tools for research and due diligence, side-by-side comparison, screening, and client reporting; Exchange that is used to update databases; and Data Feeds, which offers data solutions for internal operations. It also provides institutional investment databases, as well as datasets that offer access to hedge funds, fund of funds, and commodity products. The company serves investment consultants, asset managers, plan sponsors, and financial organizations. It provides its database services in the Asia-Pacific, Australia, Canada, Europe, Japan, the United Kingdom, and the United States. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Marietta, Georgia with additional offices in London, the United Kingdom; Sydney, Australia; Boston, Massachusetts; Seattle, Washington; and Raleigh, North Carolina.

funding_rounds.source_description: EVestment Alliance Secures $19M Credit Facilities From Silicon Valley Bank
